actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT SUM(cast(female_13_17 as decimal) + cast(female_18_24 as decimal)+cast(female_25_34 as decimal)+cast(female_35_44 as decimal)+cast(female_45_54 as decimal)+cast(female_55_64 as decimal)+cast(female_65_plus as decimal)) as female_viewer,
SUM(cast(male_13_17 as decimal) + cast(male_18_24 as decimal)+cast(male_25_34 as decimal)+cast(male_35_4 as decimal)+cast(male_45_54 as decimal)+cast(male_55_64 as decimal)+cast(male_65_plus as decimal)) as male_viewer,
SUM(cast(undefined_13_17 as decimal) + cast(undefined_18_24 as decimal)+cast(undefined_25_34 as decimal)+cast(undefined_35_44 as decimal)+cast(undefined_45_54 as decimal)+cast(undefined_55_64 as decimal)+cast(undefined_65_plus as decimal)) as undefined_viewer
FROM public."smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq" WHERE view_date >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
  AND view_date < '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
LIMIT 1;
